name: XenoShyft: Dreadmire
summary: Welcome to the Dreadmire! XenoShyft: Dreadmire, which can be played as a standalone game or mixed with assets from XenoShyft: Onslaught, brings a new XenoShyft experience to your screen, with eight new troop types, 20 new item types, and more than 40 fearsome new enemy types.
